events.message: I recently received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because I do not want to keep the product.
The issue has been reviewed and categorized as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request regarding the wrong item delivered.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. I'll do my best to assist you with your refund.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund promptly?
Sure, here is my order number 987654321 and I have attached a clear picture of the product that arrived instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and resolution offer. Thank you for handling this so efficiently.
The refund request has been processed successfully. You should see the amount returned shortly on your payment account.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
Yes, the refund has arrived in my account. Thank you very much for resolving this issue quickly.
We are happy to hear your refund was received. We will now close this case. Have a wonderful day!
